SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>That didn't seem like much of a threat,
but it's still good to know you're looking
out for me.<sp:5:0:0>
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>That thing's sheer power is nowhere
near normal!<sp:5:0:0> No way to hit it head-on
without being plain destroyed!
Thanks00: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>A little reward for you... Here,<sp:5:0:0> take this.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Thanks! More monsters turning up here
is getting to be a real pain.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>You helped me out!<sp:5:0:0> Wasn't the worst
scrap I've seen, but I could've been hurt
if I wasn't on guard.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>What a relief!<sp:5:0:0> Can you do something
about this?
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Well, look at that!<sp:5:0:0> I bet that was a piece
of cake for you, right?
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Pretty good!<sp:5:1:0> Want to be my bodyguard?<sp:5:1:0>
Ha, just kidding!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>I wish I could say I don't need the help...<sp:5:1:0>
but I've got to swallow my pride here.<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>Pretty darn close...<sp:5:1:0> Good thing you
happened by. Thanks!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>You saved me...somehow.<sp:5:1:0> When I got
knocked out, I thought I was a goner.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Yeesh. That was ugly.<sp:5:0:0> I just totally let
my guard down there.
